subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Something a little different

-------------------------------1199668272

Juli,
 
Yes we would all love to see your setup ........:)  Especially when  you are 
hanging out the window in the BATHROOM to get better reception.   Hell with 
the photographs, but do a video instead.........  WHatever it  takes to get the 
reception I always say.  But I can honestly say I love  your deetermination 
and creativeness to do it.
 
Jeff



**************Start the year off right.  Easy ways to stay in shape.     
http://body.aol.com/fitness/winter-exercise?NCID=aolcmp00300000002489
